_88sftpLinkedService.description: A linked service for an SSH File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) server.
_88sftpLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.SftpLinkedService

___encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic or SshPublicKey authentication.

___privateKeyContent.description: Base64 encoded SSH private key content for SshPublicKey authentication. For on-premises copy with SshPublicKey authentication, either PrivateKeyPath or PrivateKeyContent should be specified. SSH private key should be OpenSSH format.

___password.description: Password to logon the SFTP server for Basic authentication.

___authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the SFTP server.

___passPhrase.description: The password to decrypt the SSH private key if the SSH private key is encrypted.

___privateKeyPath.description: The SSH private key file path for SshPublicKey authentication. Only valid for on-premises copy. For on-premises copy with SshPublicKey authentication, either PrivateKeyPath or PrivateKeyContent should be specified. SSH private key should be OpenSSH format.

___username.description: The username used to log on to the SFTP server.

___port.description: The TCP port number that the SFTP server uses to listen for client connections.

___skipHostKeyValidation.description: If true, skip the SSH host key validation. Default value is false.

___hostKeyFingerprint.description: The host key finger-print of the SFTP server. When SkipHostKeyValidation is false, HostKeyFingerprint should be specified.

_88hDInsightSchemaGenerationProperties.description: Schema generation options for activities that execute against HDInsight clusters.
_88hDInsightSchemaGenerationProperties.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.HDInsightSchemaGenerationProperties

___alterSchema.description: Flag to indicate if alter schema should be performed.

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.
Properties specific to this linked service type.

___accessKey.description: The Azure Batch account access key.

___linkedServiceName.description: The azure storage linked service name.

___encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic authentication.

___password.description: Password to logon the FTP server.

___authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the FTP server.

___enableServerCertificateValidation.description: If true, validate the FTP server SSL certificate when connect over SSL/TLS channel. Default value is true.

___username.description: Username to logon the FTP server.

___port.description: The TCP port number that the FTP server uses to listen for client connections. Default value is 21.

___enableSsl.description: If true, connect to the FTP server over SSL/TLS channel. Default value is true.

___host.description: Host name of the FTP server.

___embeddedCertData.description: Base64 encoded certificate data for ClientCertificate authentication. For on-premises copy with ClientCertificate authentication, either CertThumbprint or EmbeddedCertData/Password should be specified.

___encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic, Digest, Windows or ClientCertificate authentication.

___certThumbprint.description: Thumbprint of certificate for ClientCertificate authentication. Only valid for on-premises copy. For on-premises copy with ClientCertificate authentication, either CertThumbprint or EmbeddedCertData/Password should be specified.

___password.description: Password for Basic, Digest, Windows, or ClientCertificate with EmbeddedCertData authentication.

___url.description: The base URL of the HTTP endpoint, e.g. http://www.microsoft.com.

___authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the HTTP server.

___enableServerCertificateValidation.description: If true, validate the HTTPS server SSL certificate. Default value is true.

___username.description: User name for Basic, Digest, or Windows authentication.

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

___environmentUrl.description: The Salesforce login URL. To connect to the Salesforce sandbox environment, use 'test.salesforce.com'.

___password.description: The password for Basic authentication of the Salesforce source.

___username.description: The username for Basic authentication of the Salesforce source.

___securityToken.description: The security token is required to access Salesforce.

___typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

___password.description: The password of the Amazon Redshift server.

___server.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift server.

___database.description: The database name of the Amazon Redshift server.

$eref.description: A FTP server Linked Service.
$eref.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.FtpServerLinkedService

___encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic authentication.

___password.description: Password to logon the FTP server.

___authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the FTP server.

___enableServerCertificateValidation.description: If true, validate the FTP server SSL certificate when connect over SSL/TLS channel. Default value is true.

___username.description: Username to logon the FTP server.

___port.description: The TCP port number that the FTP server uses to listen for client connections. Default value is 21.

___enableSsl.description: If true, connect to the FTP server over SSL/TLS channel. Default value is true.

___host.description: Host name of the FTP server.

$eref.description: A linked service for an SSH File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) server.
$eref.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.SftpLinkedService

___encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic or SshPublicKey authentication.

___privateKeyContent.description: Base64 encoded SSH private key content for SshPublicKey authentication. For on-premises copy with SshPublicKey authentication, either PrivateKeyPath or PrivateKeyContent should be specified. SSH private key should be OpenSSH format.

___password.description: Password to logon the SFTP server for Basic authentication.

___authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the SFTP server.

___passPhrase.description: The password to decrypt the SSH private key if the SSH private key is encrypted.

___privateKeyPath.description: The SSH private key file path for SshPublicKey authentication. Only valid for on-premises copy. For on-premises copy with SshPublicKey authentication, either PrivateKeyPath or PrivateKeyContent should be specified. SSH private key should be OpenSSH format.

___username.description: The username used to log on to the SFTP server.

___port.description: The TCP port number that the SFTP server uses to listen for client connections.

___skipHostKeyValidation.description: If true, skip the SSH host key validation. Default value is false.

___hostKeyFingerprint.description: The host key finger-print of the SFTP server. When SkipHostKeyValidation is false, HostKeyFingerprint should be specified.
